34/*
35 * v_status -- ^G
36 * Show the file status.
37 *
38 * PUBLIC: int v_status __P((SCR *, VICMD *));
39 */
40int
41v_status(SCR *sp, VICMD *vp)
42{
43 (void)msgq_status(sp, vp->m_start.lno, MSTAT_SHOWLAST);
44 return (0);
45}
